title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Skills: Community of Practice (CoP)-Based Collaborative Learning Design for University Students’ Critical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Learning Skills and Digital Tool Utilization Ability
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners apply critical thinking skills in three or more ways through collaborative activities with peers.

Learners will collaboratively complete a 3-stage critical thinking task (problem definition → solution derivation → evaluation) with team members using online/offline collaboration tools (Miro, Notion, Slack) within 2 weeks and achieve "Excellent" ratings in ≥2 out of 3 rubric criteria (clarity, logic, creativity).
Learners revise and improve their learning strategies at least once by incorporating Community of Practice (CoP) feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
